properties.Name: PackageType
properties.Description:
The type of package that a Product is packaged in.

Ex:
-  Box
-  Bottle
-  Quick serve meal tray
-  Pressed tray
-  Carton
-  Container
-  Packet
-  Can

Columns.Name: PackageTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Package Type.

Columns.Name: PackageTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Package Type.

Columns.Name: PackageTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Package Type.
